title: Scavengers: a novella
description: When successful restaurant owners Jim and Leanne Taymor confess to a grisly series of small town murders, their good friend and neighbor learns the gruesome truth that led them to kill. In Knee High, Nebraska, someone–or something–has been stalking household pets in the dead of night… but would they rather be hunting us?  A harrowing and terrifying tale of paranoia and heartbreaking loss, "Scavengers" is Duncan Ralston’s chilling debut novella, and will be included in the forthcoming GRISTLE & BONE collection exclusively on Kindle and paperback.
author: Duncan Ralston
